text.home.title: Radiodan Configuration
text.confirm.title: Important notes
text.confirm.body: Your Radiodan will connect to ${ssid} after restarting. Make sure your device is connected to the same WiFi network.
text.confirm.error: There was an error, please go back and try again.
text.connect.title: Connecting
text.connect.body: Radiodan is now connecting. This page will automatically close when the process is done.
text.join.title: ${ssid} password
text.join.body: Enter password or leave blank for no password
text.networks.title: Connect Radiodan
text.networks.body: Select a Wi-Fi network for Radiodan to join
text.networks.errorTitle: There was an error fetching Wi-Fi networks. ðŸ˜“
